nodes.title: github actions for automated release workflow
github-workflows yaml tidy, use repository-shipped mvnw in automation flow
Populate maven wrapper on MavenParser (and Maven settings from user home) (fixes #73)
instructions to run 'git apply' contain non-existing flag
Fix the maven wrapper, most of which was missing
Refactored to use new provenance structure
Set default release policy to bump next development version using minor version
traverse recipes to leaf nodes first before checking type in order to handle composite recipes
Change discover display based on feedback and current reference documentation layout
failOnInvalidActiveRecipes to configure handling activeRecipe validation errors throwing exceptions
Add logging when running a recipe
RewriteDiscover categorized recipes available on classpath
simple indent method for formatting log messages
fix rewrite.discover parameter discovery and polish help docs
recipe configuration reference information for discover
autoformatting with assistance from rewrite:run locally
do not directly instantiate log from getLog as a class field, call method each time
rewrite:discover default should only show top-level discovered recipes
chore(ci): bump actions/cache from v2.1.4 to v2.1.5
Feather in test coverage against windows machines
integration tests which consume third-party dependencies for the recipes received
remove build plugin from submodule pom xmls in tests
Tests from pom.xmls resolve respective rewrite yml configuration files
replace maven-invoker tests with maven-its suite and junit5
polish example in README, include links to full reference docs
rename rewrite:warn to rewrite:dryRun and rewrite:fix to rewrite:run
Adding pom caching to maven plugin
adds recipe descriptor to discover task output
Bump actions/cache from v2 to v2.1.4
